tagline: The provisions of section 122 of the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 (?the Ordinance?), are prospective in their application and do not apply to the assessment of a year ending on or before 30th June, 2002. The assessment of any year ending on or before 30th June, 2002 would be governed by the repealed Income Tax Ordinance, 1979 and shall be dealt with as if the Ordinance had not come into force.
